reviewText: This was such a good show. I will buy the rest of the seasons if and when they are released: no ifs, ands or buts about it. The only downside is that the video quality of the first four seasons was geared for standard definition televisions and looks rather pixelly on a large screen. Still a compelling purchase, one that I intend to make. If the series is ever released in high definition I will buy it all over again.Update 8-16-2012I just watched the first episode of season 5 and I must say I am impressed. The picture quality appears to be much improved over the first four seasons. Kudos to CBS for putting so much care into this set. I am really anticipating the release of season 6 this fall and have high hopes that the rest of the seasons will follow. This set makes me wish for a re-issue of the first four seasons with comparable picture quality. I don't expect that will ever happen but it would be really nice if it does. I'm sure it won't take me long to watch the rest of this set, probably before the next season is released. This is such a good show...!!! (oops...repeating myself. lol)

reviewText: I have been waiting and waiting for season 5 to come available. I am so happy I will soon be able to purchase it. And especially through Amazon.com! Amazon.com is the very best place to purchase things. I buy a lot of things from Amazon.com and I also review things on Amazon.com before I purchase them. I will be so happy to add Touched By An Angel season 5 to my collection as I already have seasons 1-4 in my collection. God Bless Amazon.com!!!
summary: I'm So Glad Season 5 Is Finally Here
Title: N/A

reviewText: At last, someone has eventually realised just how many fans TBAA has. I have the first four series and to be honest I thought I would be with the angels by the time they released any more of the series as I am knocking on a bit!!!I ,like many others, am extremely happy and grateful that CBS  or whoever, have at last decided to release the next season, I also hope they will release the others in quick succession.This programme, as I believe it does to others, means a great deal to me. I do not like watching violence and swearing on tv all the time.TBAA is inspirational, it shows people really can care about others..My only sadness is that the wonderful actor who played Andrew, John Dye, is no longer with us.I adored him, still do, and always will, And I miss him very much.It totally broke my heart when I heard he had passed away.God bless you John,you will live in my heart forever.

reviewText: To hear that Season 5 is about to be released on DVD is like music to my hears! It is like my birthday and Christmas rolled into one! It has been almost 5 years since Season 4 was released, and I was beginning to think that it wouldn't happen, but Praise God, it is! For those who aren't Christians, yes it is a Christian show but it is not cheesy or Bible beating like you'd expect. The only regulars are the three angels and they meet different ppl in each episode and help them out in life. The show is very encouraging and well written. Out of all 9 seasons there are probably no more than 3 episodes that I didn't like. Thank you Paramount/CBS! I would be happy to donate to a fund designated for the release on seasons 6-9, but I am confident that you will release the rest of the series as well. Only 4 more seasons left, and to release over half of the entire series and then leave us hanging would be a travesty. Let me know if I can help in any way I can!
summary: Good things come to those who wait!!
